question:
What was the fastest lap speed among all drivers in the 2009 Spanish Grand Prix?
the fastest lap speed among all refers to max(fastestLapSpeed); Spanish Grand Prix refers to races.name = 'Spanish Grand Prix';
query: SELECT T2.fastestLapSpeed FROM races AS T1 INNER JOIN results AS T2 ON T2.raceId = T1.raceId WHERE T1.name = 'Spanish Grand Prix' AND T1.year = 2009 AND NOT T2.fastestLapSpeed IS NULL ORDER BY T2.fastestLapSpeed DESC NULLS LAST LIMIT 1
